page.title: 17Work Patterns in a family.
page.content: Both my parents are working,this is unusual in our area because there is a lot of unemployment.My mother works in Prince Charles Hospital,Merthyr Tydfil a large modern building where over a 1000 people work.It is used by the people of Merthyr and of the nearby Rhymney valley so about 140,000 people rely on it.My mother works there full time.She starts at 8.30.a.m.and finishes at 4.30.She deals with applications for nurse training in all the hospitals in Mid. Glamorgan.She has worked there for 7 years and likes it.My father works in a company that makes axles and gears for the motor industry.He is a machine operator and works three shifts.Day shift from 8a.m. until 4.30.p.m.Afternoon shift 2.p.m. until 10p.m. and night shift 10 until 8a.m.When on the night shift he only works four shifts.
